text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Haah, haa… haaah…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm not finished yet. I… I need to run more.
It has been a few days since I became her trainer.
choice_data_list: I'm still a little soft with her, so…

text_block_list.text: I'm currently taking notes on how Admire Vega runs. I will use this as a basis for her training going forward, but…
Will she actually listen to me?
She does listen to light advice, but when it comes to training that requires us to work together…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm… fine being alone. I… prefer being alone.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: If I don't have a trainer, I won't be able to enter the Twinkle Series. So either way, I'd need one eventually…
It's hard to get her to do training that requires her to cooperate with me…
I am her trainer. I told her that I would support her no matter what, so I have to prove that to―

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm going to run somewhere else…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Don't… wait for me.
She ran off before I had a chance to react. I wanted to chase after her, but she was just too quick.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Hahh, hah, haa…!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: It's fine, I can still run much more today. If I continue at this pace, one day I'll reach those far away stars, all by myself.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: All… by myself.
I was so busy organizing my notes that I didn't realize it was already nighttime.
choice_data_list: But there's only a little left to do…

text_block_list.text: I hope I can get my feelings across to Admire Vega tomorrow. And I hope that I can be useful to her too.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You're here again.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, you'll catch a cold if you continue to sleep here. You should go home.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: And you left your computer on, and these notes…
"She seems to like stars." "Should I change the training start time?" "Where's a good area to stargaze?" "I'll ask Tazuna about it."
"She's doing this for 'her'?"

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: "What else can I do for her?"

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Why is she… doing all of this? I told her so many times… that I prefer doing things alone.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I thought that all I wanted was to see the stars. That all I wanted was to continue running, until I reached that faraway place.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But…
She's definitely waiting for you.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: No… that isn't true. The only reason I came back was because of my curfew. That's it.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: All the effort you're putting into me… I don't deserve it.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: There's a different Uma Musume that deserved all of this. The one who was meant to shine like a dazzling star.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: My… beloved sister.
It seems like someone covered me in a blanket. I didn't open my eyes, but in my sleep I could hear the faint sounds of footsteps.
